subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Many N.H.L. general managers criticized Brendan Shanahan’s ruling on Boston’s Milan Lucic, whose hit on Buffalo goalie Ryan Miller resulted in a concussion.
snippet: Many N.H.L. general managers criticized Brendan Shanahan’s ruling on Boston’s Milan Lucic, whose hit on Buffalo goalie Ryan Miller resulted in a concussion.
